org.gbif.doi.service

Class BaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.doi.service.BaseService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoiService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataciteService, DataCiteService, EzidService

    public abstract class BaseService
extends Object
implements DoiService
    This class provides common methods to be used by all services.

    • Method Detail

      • toXml

        protected String toXml(org.gbif.api.model.common.DOI doi,
           DataCiteMetadata data)
                throws InvalidMetadataException
        Produces a validated xml representation of the data cite metadata. The DOI inside the metadata is overwritten to always represent the given DOI and the generated XML is validated according to the datacite xsd schema.
        Returns:
        xml string
        Throws:
        InvalidMetadataException, - DoiException
        InvalidMetadataException

      • authCall

        protected String authCall(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest req)
                   throws DoiException
        Does an authenticated call and throws a DoiHttpException for nun successful responses other than 2xx. If successful return the entities body as a string.
        Throws:
        DoiException

      • reserveRandom

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.DOI reserveRandom(String prefix,
                                          String shoulder,
                                          int length,
                                          DataCiteMetadata metadata)
                                            throws DoiException
        Description copied from interface: DoiService
        Mints a new random identifier with the given DOI prefix and reserves it.
        Specified by:
        reserveRandom in interface DoiService
        Parameters:
        prefix - the identifier prefix to use to generate the random DOI
        shoulder - the optional fixed beginning of the suffix to be prepended to the generated random suffix
        length - the length of the randomly generated suffix string. minimum 3, 5-10 is recommended.
        metadata - the metadata to be associated with the doi. The identifier inside the metadata will be overwritten by the generated DOI
        Throws:
        DoiException - if the operation failed for any reason

      • random

        protected static org.gbif.api.model.common.DOI random(String prefix,
                                   String shoulder,
                                   int length)
        Returns:
        a random DOI with the given prefix. It is not guaranteed to be unique and might exist already
